name: get_a_specific_champion_s_base_stats
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool league_of_legends_stats.
Tool description: An API showing all the champions in League of Legends and their base stats.
API description: Fetches the base stats of a specified League of Legends champion using the provided RapidAPI key.

name.description: The name of the champion whose base stats are to be retrieved.
